lines.text: A close shave! And I do mean shave that thing missed by chin by an inch!
So I ran up the path...
[he is not running in the film]
I wondered what would bring Aunt Tilly to this dump...ugh...to this quant old mansion?

[after seeing Frankenstein]
Gosh! The place is haunted!
I suddenly saw a part of Aunt Tilly's dress thought I wondering if she carried a bag to match.

[after seeing skeleton]
Talk! Talk! Talk! Talk! He must be my barber!

[finds Frankenstein on the roof]
Oh gosh it is him! Alright, it is he! Why worry about grammar at a time like this.

[before Frankenstein drops a burning piece of wood]
Wait Mr. Frankenstein you are wanted on the phone!
Hot sizzilying molten lead! He wouldn't you know...pour it down? Would he? You think?
So I was killed. But, I feel better know!
